Paper.Title: Automatic Compensation for Parser Figure-of-Merit Flaws*

Section.Paragraph: Best-first chart parsing utilises a figure of merit (FOM) to efficiently guide a parse by first attending to those edges judged better.

In the past it has usually been static; this paper will show that with some extra information, a parser can compensate for FOM flaws which otherwise slow it down. Our results are faster than the prior best by a factor of 2.5; and the speedup is won with no significant decrease in parser accuracy.
